ca.teamTen.recitopia
Interface RecipeBook

All Known Implementing Classes:
CloudRecipeBook, FavoriteRecipe, LocalCache, RecipeBookBase, UserRecipeBook
public interface RecipeBook

RecipeBook stores a set of recipes, allowing for persistence and querying. Recipes are identified by their title and author; no two recipes in a book should have the same title and author.

Method Summary
 void addRecipe(Recipe recipe)
          Add or update a recipe.
 Recipe[] query(java.lang.String searchTerms)
          Query recipes with Google-style search.
 void save()
          Write RecipeBook to long-term storage.
 

Method Detail

query

Recipe[] query(java.lang.String searchTerms)
Query recipes with Google-style search. The searchTerms are split based on whitespace, and all text fields of the recipes are searched. An empty searchTerm will match all recipes.

Parameters:
searchTerms - a string containing whitespace-separated search terms.
Returns:
An array of recipes that match the query

addRecipe

void addRecipe(Recipe recipe)
Add or update a recipe. If a recipe with the same title and author already exists, it will be updated. Otherwise, the recipe will be added.

Parameters:
recipe -

save

void save()
Write RecipeBook to long-term storage.
